short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to best in class AI tools to maximise your productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickBox AI helps you quickly access multiple ai tools while you are in the browser helping user maximize their productivity or quickly use any ai tool without breaking their workflow. Small section appears on top of the current tab's content when user presses cmd+k or ctrl+k which can be escaped by pressing anywhere outside the tool or pressing shortcut again.
